name: relic-song
flavor_text: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pok√©mon. This may also induce sleep.
effect_text_extend:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to put the target to sleep.
If the user is a meloetta, it will toggle between Aria and Pirouette Forme.
effect_text_simple: Has a $effect_chance% chance to put the target to sleep.
